intro: Sonerila rotundifolia, commonly known as the round-leaf sonerila, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Melastomataceae family and is characterized by its small, oval-shaped leaves. The plant produces clusters of showy, pinkish-white flowers that bloom throughout the year. Its fruits are small capsules that release seeds when mature. Sonerila rotundifolia is often found in shaded, moist environments and is valued for its ornamental appeal.
